s: Summary: Side event uniting Web3 and AI innovators during Consensus HK 2026.
Topics: generative AI, smart contract integration, decentralized compute, data marketplaces, cross‑chain interoperability.
Speakers: AI lab CEOs, Web3 protocol founders, venture partners.
r: Access cutting‑edge AI‑Web3 convergence use cases.
Forge partnerships with AI infrastructure providers.
Identify investment theses in AI‑enabled decentralized services.
